Description: Body sherd with top of stem of Attic pottery cup; interior, black area outside coral red tondo; exterior glazed black.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p. 38, no. C.6, pl. 12, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1524) (phase 3)
